you know what to do to protect yourself and

take steps to protect yourself from credit
card hacking.

a debit card. I know we said we're talking

about credit cards, but debit cards are used
interchangeably. Unfortunately the protections

you have from a debit card aren't as strong
if your credit card is lost or stolen or hacked.

money that's connected to the debit card -- the

to make withdrawals from a debit card. So
you want to make certain that you're protecting

not just that card, but think about long-term,
your actual bank account and all the money

So one, don't use your debit card, use your

you share, bank account or credit card number

has stolen access to the connection. So you

want to do your best to protect from that

issuer immediately. They have the power to
remove fraudulent charges so that you can
